channel.title: Multiple questions o.O can you answer them :P give it a try
channel.description:
ok so i have a couple questions. 1). i downloaded hybrid pvp. + it has perfect, well near perfect pking, and everything, but when you kill someone, you don't get their drop + they lose everything. How do i fix this???
2). even as an owner, I dont like losing anything, even to an npc. In this server, if you die, you lose everything. What do i do to make it so that admin + dont lose items?
3). I want to add extra stuff like hidden mod/admin because that's something a lot of people like and will donate for, any way i can add this? or do i have time just find a server that has all this in it?

item.title: Multiple questions o.O can you answer them :P give it a try

item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“play 4 fun, post:7, topic:396434”]hey love, if you have time, think you can tv me? im confused =/[/quote]I dont tv unless it’s with vain <3

item.title: Multiple questions o.O can you answer them :P give it a try
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“play 4 fun, post:5, topic:396434”][quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=493603.msg3608930#msg3608930 date=1306370210]
there is already hidden admin and mod. It is any playerright you make it. Really all you do is give them special commands by that rank.

for the losing items www.google.com been answered several times

for the first question look in the combatassistant.java
[/quote]

-oh okayy makes sense. ty
-on google, anything specific??
-and im on combatassistant.java atm and i surely dont know what i’m looking for. anything specific again? :([/quote]

  1. “pi how to make admins not lose items”
    3.see if there is an isDead method or something like that I dont remember to be honest vain will surely remember.

Read full topic
